name: Belly Dance Girl
description:
NOTICE: This game is still at early access state.Only 7 girls unlocked and more hot girls and features will be released in the future...

These girls are really good professional belly dancers. They can dance in a very oily way and blow your mind away...

Game Features:

1 - Good and funny boobs physics
2 - Each dancer has her own background music and it will produce music notes from top to bottom, you must press the note buttons below in a very good way to make sure the combo clicks count is not less than 100 and then after the girl has finished dancing you can own one ticket.
3 - Use the tickets to enter Fantasy Space or Dancer Studio to do more amazing things with those cute sweethearts...

Enjoy yourselves!
